roleset.name: (make) become tired, weary of something
roleset.note: JADE-V NOTES: Added due to VN expansion. Based on internet usage examples and comparison with 'weary'. Verbnet class amuse-31.1. No corresponding fn class. Updated 12/10 (from jade.01-v)

role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: ARG1 and ARG0
example.text: Kampp had to admit that her life and politics had jaded her view of people in general
